channel.title: CVE Feed for Forcepoint -- Email Security
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Forcepoint -- Email Security

item.title: CVE-2024-2166|2024-09-04T21:37:17.923Z -- forcepoint -- email%20security
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Forcepoint Email Security (Real Time Monitor modules) allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Email Security: before 8.5.5 HF003.
